theme_strategy.rationale: Data-heavy applications require the high contrast and clarity of light mode for long-term readability. Dark mode is provided for low-light environments and 'hacker' persona preference.

rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use Zinc-950 (#09090B).
Primary color (Orange) is for ACTIONS only (Buttons, Active States).
Borders should be subtle but present to define structure (Swiss Grid).
No gradients on backgrounds. Flat, high-contrast surfaces.
Data cells and IDs must use Mono font.
Labels must be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing (tracking-widest).
typography.installation: Import fonts via Google Fonts in index.css: @import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Inter:wght@400;500;600&family=JetBrains+Mono:wght@400;500&family=Manrope:wght@300;400;800&display=swap');

layout.container_style: Sharp edges or max rounded-md (4px). No large radii.
strategies: Padding: Use generous padding inside containers (p-6 or p-8) even in dense grids.

customization_rules: Buttons: Sharp corners or small radius (rounded-md). High contrast hover states.
Cards: Flat, 1px border, NO SHADOW by default. Hover: subtle shadow.
Inputs: High contrast borders. Focus ring must be sharp.
Tables: Minimalist. Border-bottom only for rows. Mono font for values.

specific_components.StatusBadge: Pill-shaped, solid background (muted), colored dot indicator.
specific_components.DataCard: Rectangular, border-border, p-6, mono font for value.

images.description: Abstract flowing grid pattern on a soft gray background. Use for Hero section background or Empty State with low opacity.
Abstract white wavy lines with grid pattern. Alternative background.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through z-index and subtle borders, not heavy shadows.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (hover, focus, active).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Do not use 'transition: all'. Animate specific properties.
Export components as named exports, pages as default exports.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Install fonts defined in Typography section.
2. Update tailwind.config.js with the Swiss Tactical color palette.
3. Create a 'Layout' component that handles the Sidebar/Header structure.
4. Build the 'Dashboard' page using the High Density Grid.
5. Implement the 'ScraperForm' with validation and progress indication.
6. Create the 'ResultsTable' using Shadcn Table but styled minimally.
7. Ensure all API calls use the Bearer token management system.
8. Use the provided image URLs for empty states.
